product_name: KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Colorful LED Water Speaker with Dancing Fountain Light Show Sound for PC, MP3 Player, Laptops, Smartphone Black
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Colorful LED Water Speaker were estimated by considering raw material extraction and processing (15-20 kg CO2e for 0.5 kg of electronics and components), transportation of raw materials to the manufacturing facility in China (0.05-0.1 kg CO2e for 0.5 kg of components transported approximately 10,000 km by sea), and manufacturing and assembly processes (0.7-1.6 kg CO2e assuming 1-2 kWh of electricity consumption). The total estimated emissions range from 15.75 to 21.7 kg CO2e, with an average of 18.7 kg CO2e.

product_name: Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 Eyefinity 6 Edition 2048 MB GDDR5 PCI-Express Video Card 5870PE52G
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 Eyefinity 6 Edition graphics card are estimated to be around 99 kg. This includes emissions from the production of the GPU (approximately 70 kg CO2e), 2 GB GDDR5 RAM (around 15 kg CO2e), PCB and other components (about 12 kg CO2e), and transportation of raw materials and components to the manufacturing facility (roughly 2 kg CO2e). These estimates are based on simplified assumptions regarding the emissions associated with semiconductor manufacturing, component production, and transportation.

product_name: Case for iPad Pro 12.9 2022/2021/2020/2018, Blue Flowers Shockproof Protective Case for iPad Pro 12.9 6th/5th/4th/3rd Gen, [Auto Sleep/Wake] [with Pencil Holder] Adjustable Stand iPad Case Folio Cover
explanation: Cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the iPad Pro case were estimated by considering raw material extraction and processing (PU leather, TPU, and microfiber), transportation of raw materials to the manufacturing facility (assuming sea and road freight), and manufacturing and assembly processes. The total emissions were calculated to be approximately 5.32 kg CO2e, with the majority coming from raw material production.

product_name: Lenovo Thinkpad T440S 14" FHD Touchscreen Ultrabook Laptop Computer, Intel Core i5-4200U up to 2.6GHz, 8GB RAM, 240GB SSD, WiFi, Bluetooth, USB 3.0, Windows 10 Professional (Renewed)
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the Lenovo Thinkpad T440S laptop are estimated to be around 350 kg. This estimate is based on the average emissions for laptop production, considering the extraction and processing of raw materials, transportation of components, and manufacturing and assembly processes. The actual emissions can vary depending on the specifics of the manufacturing process, component sourcing, and transportation modes used.

product_name: Ceeyali Reusable Hook and Loop Fastening Cable Ties Cable Straps for Home Office Tablet PC TV Electronics Wires Organizer Management (15 Pack 8 inch + 15 Pack 12 inch)
explanation: The CO2e emissions for the Ceeyali Reusable Hook and Loop Fastening Cable Ties Cable Straps were estimated by considering raw material extraction and processing (0.3185 kg CO2e for 0.091 kg of fabric material), transportation of raw materials (0.020475 kg CO2e assuming international sourcing), and manufacturing and assembly processes (0.091 kg CO2e). The total cradle-to-gate emissions are approximately 0.43 kg CO2e.

product_name: HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece with One Pair Medium Earmolds for Speaker Mics
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece were estimated by considering raw material extraction and processing (0.063 kg CO2e), transportation of raw materials to the manufacturing facility (0.00117 kg CO2e), manufacturing and assembly processes (0.0441 kg CO2e), and packaging emissions until the product leaves the factory gate (0.245 kg CO2e), totaling approximately 0.35 kg CO2e.

product_name: ASUS VivoBook Thin and Light Laptop, 15.6" HD Display, Intel Core i3-1005G1 Processor, USB Type-C, Webcam, Wi-Fi, HDMI, Windows 11 Home, Gray (12GB RAM | 256GB SSD)
explanation: The estimated cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the ASUS VivoBook Thin and Light Laptop are approximately 320 kg. This estimate is based on the average emissions for laptop production, considering the extraction and processing of raw materials for its components (like the Intel Core i3 processor, 12GB RAM, and 256GB SSD), transportation of these components to the manufacturing site, the energy-intensive manufacturing and assembly processes, and preparation for shipping. The actual emissions can vary based on specific production details, such as the manufacturing location, transportation modes, and the efficiency of the manufacturing process.

product_name: SMDV Diffuser-50 -- Professional 20x20" Rigid Softbox for Canon Flash
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the SMDV Diffuser-50 were estimated by considering the emissions from raw material extraction and processing (5.336 kg CO2e), transportation of raw materials to the manufacturing facility (0.0601 kg CO2e), and the manufacturing and assembly processes (0.5 kg CO2e). The total emissions were calculated to be 5.896 kg CO2e.

product_name: RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit with 32GB Micro SD Card, Power Supply with ON/Off, Case, Micro SDHC Card, Cooling Fan, HDMI Cable, Network Cable, Hestsinks, Card Reader, Screwdriver
explanation: The estimated cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit are approximately 35.2 kg. This estimate is based on the emissions associated with the production of the Raspberry Pi board, micro SD card, and other components, as well as the transportation of raw materials and manufacturing processes. The Raspberry Pi board is the largest contributor due to its complex manufacturing process and material requirements. Other components like the micro SD card, power supply, and cables also contribute to the overall emissions.

product_name: USB 3.0 Extension Cable 20Ft, TanGuYu USB 3.0 Extender Cord Type A Male to A Female for Oculus VR, Playstation, Xbox, USB Flash Drive, Card Reader, Hard Drive,Keyboard, Printer, Scanner, Camera
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the USB 3.0 Extension Cable were estimated by considering raw material extraction and processing, transportation of raw materials, manufacturing and assembly, and packaging. The dominant factor is the raw material extraction, particularly due to the gold used in the connectors. The total emissions are approximately 8.26 kg CO2e per unit.
